mapper.sql: id, blockid, name, tasktype, flowtype, state, process, editid, checkid, projectid, referdata, batchid, editlist, priority, rank, operatetime, systype, starttime, endtime, time, ip
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from edittask.tb_task
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into edittask.tb_task (id, blockid, name, tasktype, flowtype, state, process, editid, checkid, projectid, referdata, batchid, editlist, priority, rank, operatetime, systype, starttime, endtime, time, ip ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blockid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{referdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editlist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{systype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
